signUp.heading: Join Donna Vino
signUp.paragraph: Create a profile for your future orders to have all your information saved and ready to use. Registering on our website is quick and easy, allowing you to streamline your shopping experience and enjoy a faster checkout every time.
signUp.ageTooltip: Why do we ask? Since we sell alcoholic beverages, you must be 18 or older to make a purchase.
signUp.validation.emailFormat: Please enter a valid email address.
signUp.validation.emailMatch: Emails do not match. Please check and try again.
signUp.validation.passwordFormat: Password must be at least 8 characters long, including one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (e.g., !, @, #, $).
signUp.validation.passwordMatch: Passwords do not match. Please check and try again.
signUp.validation.birthdate: Your date of birth in DD/MM/YYYY.
signUp.validation.ageRequirement: You must be at least 18 years old to register.
signUp.updates: Subscribe to receive product updates and promotions.
signUp.title: Sign Up | Create Your Donna Vino Account Page
signUp.description: Register to manage your profile and enjoy a personalized wine shopping experience with Donna Vino.
signUp.verification-completed.seo.title: Signup Verified | Welcome to Donna Vino
signUp.verification-completed.seo.descri: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now access your account and start using all features of Donna Vino.
signUp.welcome.message: Your email has been successfully registered in our system. Please check your inbox for the confirmation email regarding your registration. Once confirmed, you will be able to access your personalized profile dashboard, where you can upload your profile picture, update your information, and complete all the required details to streamline your future orders and enhance your shopping experience.
signUp.welcome.button: Back to the log in page
signUp.welcome.title: Done! Welcome on board!
signUp.welcome.paragraph1: Your email has been registered successfully.
signUp.welcome.paragraph2: Check your inbox for a confirmation email.
signUp.welcome.paragraph3: Once you confirm, you’ll be able to access your profile, upload a photo, update your info, and complete the setup to make future orders easier and improve your shopping experience.
signUp.verification-completed.title: E-mail Verification Completed
signUp.verification-completed.message: Thanks for verifying your e-mail! Everything’s all set — you can now enjoy full access to your account.
signUp.welcome.resend.success: Verification email has been resent successfully! If you still don't see the email, please check your spam folder.
signUp.welcome.resend.error: Failed to resend the verification email. Please try again.
signUp.welcome.resend.noEmail: No email address found. Please try signing up again.
signUp.welcome.seo.title: Verify Your Email | Complete Your Account Setup
signUp.welcome.seo.description: Please check your inbox and click the verification link to activate your account.
signUp.verificationFailed.title: Verification Failed
signUp.verificationFailed.message: There was a problem with your verification. Please try signing up again or contact our support team if the issue persists.
signUp.canceled.title: Registration Canceled
signUp.canceled.message: Your registration has been successfully canceled and all your pre-registration data has been removed from our system.
signUp.declineError.title: Unable to Decline Email Verification
signUp.declineError.message: We couldn't process your request to cancel your registration. The verification link may have expired or is invalid. If you still wish to cancel your registration, contact our support team.
logIn.title: Log In to Your Account | Donna Vino
logIn.description: Access your account securely by logging in with your email and password.
salesCards.card1.title: The best Italian wines, delivered with care
salesCards.card1.description1: At Donna Vino, we believe that great wine deserves exceptional service. That's why we offer personalized hand delivery within the Copenhagen area, ensuring your wines arrive safely and with a personal touch.
salesCards.card1.description2: Prefer to stop by? You can collect your order from our local sales outlet whenever it suits you.
salesCards.card2.title: Safe, Secure & Worry-Free Wine Shopping
salesCards.card2.description1: Donna Vino offers a transparent, and customer-friendly shopping experience from start to finish.
salesCards.card2.description2: If something's not quite right, we're here to help. You can cancel or return your order within 14 days, as long as the items are unused and in original packaging. Some exceptions apply for perishable or customized products.
salesCards.card2.urlTitle: Read More about Return and Cancellation Policy
salesCards.card3.title: Secure & Convenient Payment Options
salesCards.card3.description1: At Donna Vino, we prioritize both security and convenience. All transactions are processed through secure, encrypted systems, so you can shop with peace of mind.
salesCards.card3.description2: Process your payment with  MobilePay, Credit Card or direct Bank Transfer. Shop with confidence: your payment info is safe, and your wine is just a click away.
tasting.heading1: Book your seat at our next tasting session
tasting.heading2: Find the perfect wine for every occasion
tasting.paragraph1: Join us for a premium wine tasting experience, where you’ll explore handpicked fine wines, learn from experts, and discover new flavors.
tasting.paragraph1-extra: Book your seat now and enjoy an unforgettable journey through taste and tradition!
tasting.paragraph2: At Donna Vino, we believe there’s a perfect wine for every occasion. Explore our wines, carefully curated by our head sommelier, Katrine.
tasting.paragraph3: Sign up for our newsletter to receive offers and information about tastings and future events, directly to your e-mail account.
services.heading: Trusted by thousands to find and purchase the perfect wine for any occasion
services.p1: Shop the danish’s best wine marketplace
services.p2: Careful delivery right to your doorstep
services.p3: Discover our exclusive and unique events
forgotPassword.heading: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.paragraph: No worries! Enter the email address used for registration, and we'll send you a temporary link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.success-text1: You will soon receive a link at
forgotPassword.check-inbox.title: Check Your Inbox | Password Reset Instructions Sent
forgotPassword.check-inbox.description: We've sent a link to reset your password. Please check your email inbox and follow the instructions to regain access to your account.
forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password | Reset Your Account Access
forgotPassword.description: Forgot your password? Enter your email address to receive a secure link and reset your account credentials in just a few steps.
events.error.loading: Failed to load events. Please try again later.
events.title: Events | Wine Tastings & More at Donna Vino
events.description: Discover upcoming wine tastings and special events hosted by Donna Vino. Taste new wines, meet fellow wine lovers, and enjoy relaxed, social experiences.
events-header.h1: Secure your spot for our upcoming events
events-header.p: Easily reserve one or more seats for our upcoming events, featuring freshly prepared Italian cuisine and wine tastings curated by our expert team.
events-header.card1-p: Check the calendar for upcoming event dates. It shows availability in three colors: Green for full access, Orange for limited seats, and Red for sold out. Click on your desired date to proceed with your booking.
events-header.card2-p: When you click the date you will be able to view the event details, including the selected wines and dinner menu. Then, choose the number of seats you want and proceed to the final step, checkout.
events-header.card3-p: In the checkout you will be able to see the details of your reservation, and proceed to payment after verifying your age with mitID. A confirmation message will be sent to your e-mail once your reservation is complete.
event.details.title: Event's details
event.details.allergies: (*) For allergies or special requests, please contact us after confirming your reservation.
event.details.wineCard.title: Our Wines
event.details.menuCard.title: Our Dinner Menu
event.reservation.title: Ticket reservation
event.reservation.seats: How many seats would you like to reserve?
event.reservation.selectSeats: Select your desired seats using the seat selector.
profile.title: My Profile | Manage Your Donna Vino Account
profile.description: View and edit your personal information and addresses. Keep your Donna Vino profile up to date for a smooth shopping experience.
modal.p: Our eCommerce platform is currently being created and updated and will be live as soon as possible. In the meantime, feel free to contact us for any inquiries, or you can simply close this modal.
events.noEventsForMonth: No events available for this month.
sales.title: Sales Policy
sales.description: Review Donna Vino's sales terms, including details on payment methods, shipping conditions, returns, and customer rights.
sales.payment.p1: We accept the following payment methods:
sales.payment.p3: All payments are processed securely. The payment will be debited from your account immediately upon order confirmation.
sales.delivery.p1: We strive to deliver your order as quickly as possible.
sales.delivery.li1-2: 2–5 business days within the Copenhagen area
sales.delivery.li2-2: Currently, we do not offer international shipping.
sales.delivery.p3: Hand delivery to your address or collection from our sales outlet, located at Christianshavns Voldgade 54, 1424 København.
sales.delivery.p4: Shipping confirmation and tracking information will be provided via email once your order has been dispatched.
sales.returns.p1: You have the right to cancel your order within 14 days of receiving the item.
sales.returns.p2: To be eligible for a return:
sales.returns.li1: The item must be unused and in its original packaging.
sales.returns.p3: To cancel your order or initiate a return:
sales.returns.p5: with your order number and reason for return.
sales.returns.p7: Some perishable goods and customized items may be excluded from the right of cancellation. This will be stated clearly on the relevant product pages.
sales.returns.p8: Refunds will be processed within 5 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item.
sales.cancellation.p1: According to EU consumer protection law (Directive 2011/83/EU, Article 16), the right of withdrawal does not apply to the sale of services related to leisure activities, such as event bookings, when the contract provides for a specific date or period of performance.
sales.cancellation.p2: For this reason, all ticket purchases for Donna Vino events (such as wine tastings or other experiences) are non-refundable and cannot be cancelled if the event is scheduled to take place within 14 days from the date of purchase.
sales.cancellation.p3: If you wish to cancel your booking and more than 14 days remain before the event, please contact us at info@donnavino.dk with your order number and request. We will review your case and confirm your eligibility for a partial or full refund, depending on the circumstances.
sales.cancellation.p4: Thank you for understanding. We kindly ask our guests to book thoughtfully, as last-minute cancellations affect the planning and quality of our experiences.
sales.rights.p1: In accordance with Danish consumer law, customers have a right to complain about a product within 24 months of purchase.
sales.rights.li1-2: with details and pictures of the issue.
sales.rights.li2: Provide your order number and date of purchase.
sales.rights.p3: If a solution cannot be reached, you may submit your complaint to the Consumer Complaints Board via
sales.complaints.p1: If you have any other inquiries regarding our services, please contact us at:
sales.complaints.p2: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 2 business days.
sales.footer: This information is provided in compliance with the Consumer Ombudsman’s requirements for use of MobilePay and ensures transparency for our valued customers.
notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notFound.seo.title: Page Not Found | Donna Vino
notFound.seo.description: The page you're looking for can't be found. It may have been moved, deleted, or never existed. Return to the homepage or use the search function to find what you need.
home.title: Donna Vino | Discover and Enjoy Fine Wines Online
home.description: Explore a curated selection of quality wines from around the world. Shop easily, learn about wine, and enjoy a personalized experience with Donna Vino.
